
Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Diamonds Chart by Colour

```{r}
p<-  ggplot(diamonds,aes(color, group=color, fill=color))+
  geom_bar()+theme_classic()+ylab("Count")+xlab("Color")
ggplotly(p)
```

> Source: Diamonds dataset

Column {data-width=350}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Diamond Frequency by Cut

```{r, message=FALSE, error=FALSE}
p <- ggplot(diamonds,aes(price,colour=cut))+
            geom_freqpoly(binwidth=500)+theme_minimal()+ylab("Count")+xlab("Price")
ggplotly(p)
```

>Source: Diamonds dataset

### Interactive Linear Model

```{r}
p <- ggplot(diamonds,aes(carat,price))+geom_point()+geom_smooth(se=TRUE)+theme_minimal()+ylab("Price")+xlab("Carat")
ggplotly(p)
```

>Source: Diamonds dataset
